The claim of a 32: 000-year-old idol of Lord Narasimha found in Germany has been circulating online for several years, with posts in Kannada on Facebook dating back to 2012.
Postcard News published an article in 20: 000-year-old Lord Narasimha idol in Germany, but the article featured a different man-lion figurine.
Several YouTube videos also make similar: 4. The viral image used to support the claim is actually from a feature story published in 2009 on the Sampradaya Sun's website, which mentions the location of the idol as Sridham Mayapur in West Bengal, India.
